verses.verse: ( To Your Name Be the Glory) ( 230 135:1-21 ) לֹ֤א <WH3808> lō Not לָ֥נוּ Prep│1cp ( lā·nū) to us, יְהוָ֗ה 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) O LORD, לֹ֫א 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō) not לָ֥נוּ Prep│1cp ( lā·nū) to us, כִּֽי־ 3588 Conj ( kî-) but לְ֭שִׁמְךָ 8034 Prep-l│N-msc│2ms ( lə·šim·ḵā) to Your name תֵּ֣ן 5414 V-Qal-Imp-ms ( tên) be כָּב֑וֹד 3519 N-ms ( kā·ḇō·wḏ) the glory, עַל־ 5921 Prep ( ‘al-) because of חַ֝סְדְּךָ֗ 2617 N-msc│2ms ( ḥas·də·ḵā) Your loving devotion, עַל־ 5921 Prep ( ‘al-) because אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ 571 N-fsc│2ms ( ’ă·mit·te·ḵā) of Your faithfulness.

לָ֭מָּה <WH4100> lām·māh Why יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> yō·mə·rū say, הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> hag·gō·w·yim should the nations אַיֵּה־ <WH346> ’ay·yêh- “ Where נָ֝֗א <WH4994> nā ... אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hê·hem is their God? ”

וֵֽאלֹהֵ֥ינוּ <WH430> wê·lō·hê·nū Our God בַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> ḇaš·šā·mā·yim is in heaven; כֹּ֭ל <WH3605> kōl as אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- - חָפֵ֣ץ <WH2654> ḥā·p̄êṣ He pleases. עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> ‘ā·śāh He does

עֲ‍ֽ֭צַבֵּיהֶם <WH6091> ‘ăṣab·bê·hem Their idols כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> ke·sep̄ are silver וְזָהָ֑ב <WH2091> wə·zā·hāḇ and gold, מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗ה <WH4639> ma·‘ă·śêh made יְדֵ֣י <WH3027> yə·ḏê by the hands אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> ’ā·ḏām of men.

פֶּֽה־ <WH6310> peh- They have mouths לָ֭הֶם Prep│Pro-3mp ( lā·hem) ..., וְלֹ֣א 3808 Conj-w│Adv-NegPrt ( wə·lō) but cannot יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ 1696 V-Piel-Imperf-3mp ( yə·ḏab·bê·rū) speak; עֵינַ֥יִם 5869 N-cd ( ‘ê·na·yim) they have eyes לָ֝הֶ֗ם Prep-l│Pro-3mp ( lā·hem) ..., וְלֹ֣א 3808 Conj-w│Adv-NegPrt ( wə·lō) but cannot יִרְאֽוּ׃ 7200 V-Qal-Imperf-3mp ( yir·’ū) see;

אָזְנַ֣יִם <WH241> ’ā·zə·na·yim they have ears לָ֭הֶם Prep│3mp ( lā·hem) , וְלֹ֣א 3808 Conj-w│Adv-NegPrt ( wə·lō) but cannot יִשְׁמָ֑עוּ 8085 V-Qal-Imperf-3mp ( yiš·mā·‘ū) hear; אַ֥ף 639 N-ms ( ’ap̄) they have noses לָ֝הֶ֗ם Prep│3mp ( lā·hem) , וְלֹ֣א 3808 Conj-w│Adv-NegPrt ( wə·lō) but cannot יְרִיחֽוּן׃ 7306 V-Hifil-Imperf-3mp│Pn ( yə·rî·ḥūn) smell;

יְדֵיהֶ֤ם׀ <WH3027> yə·ḏê·hem they have hands, וְלֹ֬א <WH3808> wə·lō but cannot יְמִישׁ֗וּן <WH4184> yə·mî·šūn feel; רַ֭גְלֵיהֶם <WH7272> raḡ·lê·hem they have feet, וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> wə·lō but cannot יְהַלֵּ֑כוּ <WH1980> yə·hal·lê·ḵū walk; לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lō- they cannot יֶ֝הְגּ֗וּ <WH1897> yeh·gū even clear בִּגְרוֹנָֽם׃ <WH1627> biḡ·rō·w·nām their throats. ( Literally they cannot utter with their throat)

כְּ֭מוֹהֶם <WH3644> kə·mō·w·hem like them, יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> yih·yū become עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <WH6213> ‘ō·śê·hem Those who make them כֹּ֭ל <WH3605> kōl as do all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- who בֹּטֵ֣חַ <WH982> bō·ṭê·aḥ trust בָּהֶֽם׃ Prep│3mp ( bā·hem) in them.

יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl O Israel, ( MT; many Hebrew manuscripts, LXX, and Syriac O house of Israel) בְּטַ֣ח <WH982> bə·ṭaḥ trust בַּיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh in the LORD! עֶזְרָ֖ם <WH5828> ‘ez·rām is their help וּמָגִנָּ֣ם <WH4043> ū·mā·ḡin·nām and shield. הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> hū He

בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> bêṯ O house אַ֭הֲרֹן <WH175> ’a·hă·rōn of Aaron, בִּטְח֣וּ <WH982> biṭ·ḥū trust בַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh in the LORD! עֶזְרָ֖ם <WH5828> ‘ez·rām is their help וּמָגִנָּ֣ם <WH4043> ū·mā·ḡin·nām and shield. הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> hū He

יִרְאֵ֣י <WH3373> yir·’ê You who fear יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD, בִּטְח֣וּ <WH982> biṭ·ḥū trust בַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh in the LORD! עֶזְרָ֖ם <WH5828> ‘ez·rām is their help וּמָגִנָּ֣ם <WH4043> ū·mā·ḡin·nām and shield. הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> hū He

יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD זְכָרָ֪נוּ <WH2142> zə·ḵā·rā·nū is mindful of us; יְבָ֫רֵ֥ךְ <WH1288> yə·ḇā·rêḵ He will bless us. יְ֭בָרֵךְ <WH1288> yə·ḇā·rêḵ He will bless אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> bêṯ the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel; יְ֝בָרֵ֗ךְ <WH1288> yə·ḇā·rêḵ He will bless אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> bêṯ the house אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> ’a·hă·rōn of Aaron;

יְ֭בָרֵךְ <WH1288> yə·ḇā·rêḵ He will bless יִרְאֵ֣י <WH3373> yir·’ê those who fear יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD — הַ֝קְּטַנִּ֗ים <WH6996> haq·qə·ṭan·nîm small עִם־ <WH5973> ‘im- and הַגְּדֹלִֽים׃ <WH1419> hag·gə·ḏō·lîm great alike.

יֹסֵ֣ף <WH3254> yō·sêp̄ give you increase יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh May the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5921> ‘ă·lê·ḵem ..., עֲ֝לֵיכֶ֗ם <WH5921> ‘ă·lê·ḵem both you וְעַל־ <WH5921> wə·‘al- and בְּנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1121> bə·nê·ḵem your children.

בְּרוּכִ֣ים <WH1288> bə·rū·ḵîm be blessed אַ֭תֶּם <WH859> ’at·tem May you לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh by the LORD, עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <WH6213> ‘ō·śêh the Maker שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> šā·ma·yim of heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> wā·’ā·reṣ and earth.

הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> haš·šā·ma·yim The highest heavens שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> ma·yim ... לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh belong to the LORD, וְ֝הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> wə·hā·’ā·reṣ but the earth נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> nā·ṯan He has given לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> liḇ·nê- vvv אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> ’ā·ḏām to mankind.

לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō It is not הַ֭מֵּתִים <WH4191> ham·mê·ṯîm the dead יְהַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> yə·hal·lū- who praise יָ֑הּ <WH3050> yāh the LORD, וְ֝לֹ֗א <WH3808> wə·lō nor כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- any יֹרְדֵ֥י <WH3381> yō·rə·ḏê who descend דוּמָֽה׃ <WH1745> ḏū·māh into silence.

וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ׀ <WH587> wa·’ă·naḥ·nū But it is we נְבָ֘רֵ֤ךְ <WH1288> nə·ḇā·rêḵ who will bless יָ֗הּ <WH3050> yāh the LORD, מֵֽעַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> mê·‘at·tāh both now וְעַד־ <WH5704> wə·‘aḏ- and forevermore עוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> ‘ō·w·lām .... הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> hal·lū- Hallelujah יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> yāh ...! ( Or Hallelu YAH, meaning Praise the LORD)
